text: is a train and tram station in Matsuyama, Ehime Prefecture, Japan. It is on the Takahama Line, Ōtemachi Line, and Jōhoku Line, all operated by Iyotetsu. During most of the day, railway trains arrive every fifteen minutes. Trains continue from Matsuyama City Station on the Yokogawara Line to Yokogawara Station. ==Lines== * Iyotetsu ** Takahama Line (railway) ** Ōtemachi Line, Jōhoku Line (tram) ==Adjacent stations== |- !colspan=5|Iyotetsu ==References== Category:Iyotetsu Takahama Line Category:Railway stations in Ehime Prefecture Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1888
title: Komachi Station
